gupta The system is designed to be as minimal as possible, and have the tokens maintain a 1 token == $1 peg at all times. This is a stablecoin with the properties: - Exogenously Collateralized - Dollar Pegged - Algorithmically Stable It is similar to DAI if DAI had no governance, no fees, and was backed by only WETH and WBTC. Our DSC system should always be \"overcollateralized\". At no point, should the value of all collateral < the $ backed value of all the DSC.","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"depositETHOnly()":{"details":"Users deposit first, then manually mint DSC later This gives users more control compared to depositETHAndMintDSC()"},"getETHRequiredForDSCRepayment(uint256)":{"params":{"dscAmount":"Amount of DSC to repay"},"returns":{"ethNeeded":"Estimated ETH required (with 5% buffer)"}},"getMaxMintableAmount(address)":{"params":{"user":"The address to check"},"returns":{"maxMintable":"Maximum DSC that can be minted without breaking health factor"}},"repayDSCWithETH(uint256)":{"details":"Automatically swaps ETH \u2192 USDC \u2192 Repays DSC","params":{"dscAmountToRepay":"Amount of DSC debt to repay"}},"repayDSCWithETHDirect(uint256)":{"details":"Direct ETH payment, calculates value based on oracle price","params":{"dscAmountToRepay":"Amount of DSC to repay"}}},"title":"DSCEngine","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"depositETHOnly()":{"notice":"Deposit native ETH as collateral WITHOUT auto-minting DSC"},"getETHRequiredForDSCRepayment(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculate ETH needed to repay given DSC amount"},"getMaxMintableAmount(address)":{"notice":"Get maximum DSC amount user can safely mint"},"repayDSCWithETH(uint256)":{"notice":"Repay DSC debt using native ETH"},"repayDSCWithETHDirect(uint256)":{"notice":"Repay DSC using ETH (Testnet version - no Uniswap)"}},"notice":"This contract is the core of the Decentralized Stablecoin system. It handles all the logic for minting and redeeming DSC, as well as depositing and withdrawing collateral.This contract is based on the MakerDAO DSS depositETHOnly().details: Users deposit first, then manually mint DSC later This gives users more control compared to depositETHAndMintDSC()

returns.maxMintable: Maximum DSC that can be minted without breaking health factor

repayDSCWithETH(uint256).details: Automatically swaps ETH  USDC  Repays DSC

params.dscAmountToRepay: Amount of DSC debt to repay

repayDSCWithETHDirect(uint256).details: Direct ETH payment, calculates value based on oracle price

depositETHOnly().notice: Deposit native ETH as collateral WITHOUT auto-minting DSC

getETHRequiredForDSCRepayment(uint256).notice: Calculate ETH needed to repay given DSC amount

repayDSCWithETH(uint256).notice: Repay DSC debt using native ETH

repayDSCWithETHDirect(uint256).notice: Repay DSC using ETH (Testnet version - no Uniswap)
